changeSet.author: MediBook_Admin
changeSet.comment: Convert email column from citext to varchar(255)
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE users ALTER COLUMN email TYPE varchar(255) USING email::varchar(255);

rollback.sql: ALTER TABLE users ALTER COLUMN email TYPE citext USING email::citext;

changeSet.author: MediBook_Admin
changeSet.comment: Convert ip_address column from inet to varchar(255)
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE refresh_tokens ALTER COLUMN ip_address TYPE varchar(255) USING host(ip_address);

rollback.sql: ALTER TABLE refresh_tokens ALTER COLUMN ip_address TYPE inet USING ip_address::inet;
